title: US and Eurozone current and capital accounts

content.question: The United States and the Eurozone are trading partners with flexible exchange rates, and the United States has a capital and financial account surplus. If Europeans reduce their demand for United States financial assets, which of the following will occur?

choices.label: The natural rate of unemployment in the United States will decrease.
United States imports from Europe will increase.
The United States current account will move toward surplus.
The United States capital and financial account surplus will increase.
United States exports to Europe will decrease.

content.answer: The United States current account will move toward surplus.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance
